identity.description:
Search SPL entries using various filters and retrieve metadata with results.

Search DailyMed Structured Product Labels (SPLs) for a drug or product name, returning label identifiers and metadata.
capabilities: search SPLs by drug or product name
retrieve label metadata for regulatory context

drug_name.description: Generic or brand name of the drug, e.g., 'TAMSULOSIN HYDROCHLORIDE'.

setid.description: Set ID corresponding to the SPL.

pagesize.description: Number of items per page, maximum 100, default 100.

safety.misuse_cases: Label content should be checked for version and manufacturer context.

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
